title: Virtual Training Design and Development Strategy Based on ISO 10015

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational instructional design theory and digital learning tool utilization experience
context.additional_context: Emphasizing practical competencies applicable to real educational development projects. Mobile-optimized content in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can explain the application procedures of the ISO 10015 framework for training needs analysis
Learners can establish strategies linking educational objectives with assessment tools when designing virtual training programs
Learners can utilize content development methods to enhance learner engagement in mobile microlearning environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
